body:
Hey everyone,
I know there may be a few posts in the past similar or related to this one, but seeming such a post is always going to have updates, i thought it would be fun to create it.

This is my own Avicus Milestones Club, where I add all of the players who a legible to a designated area. 
For example, if you have 10,000 kills or more (which is below) you can comment your name and ill check, thus adding you to the club/list. Please notify me in comments whether you would like me to put your exact count next to your name or not.

I feel this list will help boost the positivity and satisfaction of those who make the list and increase inspiration and motivation to those who aren't on it yet.

People who are validly in the club (s) must be active on the server and your own name (can't nominate anyone else).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PLEASE NOTE:
This list is genuinely for fun and satisfying purposes; there is no competition intended!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

(There are more than 5 positions to be filled, I just added the dots as fillers)

10,000+ Kills Club:
Eteh
OPTOBAT
Jahaj
FrozenSolistice
.

20,000+ Kills Club
Milyye
Sethskye

.
.

30,000+ Kills Club

DaFrozenBlaze
250+ Monuments Club
Eteh
OPTOBAT

.
.

500+ Monuments Club

1,000+ Monuments Club

.
.

2,000+ Monuments Club

.

.
.

1.5+ K/D Club (Both forms of K/D must be over these numbers)
SevoTheSavage

.

.

2+ K/D Club

.

DaFrozenBlaze

2+ Months On Server
99250
.
.
.
.

+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
AVICUS VETERANS
+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=

Joined Avicus 12+ Months Ago
Eteh
OPTOBAT
Quizas
Random_Guy
Upsoar
Jahaj
FrozenSolistice
ImYourPal
keller183

Joined Avicus 2 Years Ago
.
.
.
.

Joined Avicus Over 30 Months Ago (And still active)
99250
Colecrc
SevoTheSavage
Sethskye

Congratulations to everyone who made the list, and good luck to those who haven't YET.
If you feel this post is missing a milestone list, tell me below and we can negotiate.
